title: Chicken satay salad
ingredients: ['550 g (1¼ lb) skinless boneless chicken breasts (fillets)', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '3 tbsp soy sauce', '1 tbsp fish sauce', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2.5 cm (1 in) piece fresh root ginger, finely chopped', '250 g (8½ oz) basmati rice, well rinsed', '100 g (3½ oz) mange-tout, halved', 'grated zest and juice of 2 limes', '2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander', '½ small head of Chinese leaves, about 225 g (8 oz), shredded', '¼ cucumber, diced', '4 spring onions, cut into thin strips', 'Spicy peanut dressing', '1 small onion, finely chopped', '3 tbsp crunchy peanut butter', '1 fresh mild red chilli, seeded and finely chopped', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) reduced-fat coconut milk', '1 tsp caster sugar']
